description: This file defines a Notification class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, inheriting from a base message class. It provides constructors, a destructor, and member functions for string representation and validation. The file includes licensing information and necessary header inclusions.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC notification message within WebSockets communication, providing serialization and validation functions.

methods.name: Notification
methods.description: Default constructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the notification message.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the notification message is valid.
